name: Announce a new feature
description:
Use this workflow when you release a new feature and want to notify only the users it actually applies to. This avoids blanket announcements and keeps feature messaging relevant. This pattern is especially useful when features are gated by:

- plan or account type
- role or permissions
- rollout conditions
- product usage level

We've left the event points empty so you can add your own events, but feel free to use the suggested email copy we've added.

actions.name: Feature available
actions.description: Trigger when a feature becomes available to a user.

actions.name: User eligible?
actions.description: Check whether the user meets the criteria to use the feature.

actions.name: Announcement
actions.description: Tell the user the feature is available.

value.html:
Hi there,

 

Good news – there’s something new waiting for you.

 

We’ve just rolled out a new feature that’s now available in your account. It’s designed to make things simpler, faster, or generally less annoying (pick your favorite outcome).

 

If you want to give it a spin, you can jump straight in here:
Try the new feature

No rush. But if you’ve been wishing for “that one thing” to exist, this might be it.

 

Happy exploring,

The team

value.subject: New feature unlocked
value.preheader: It's live and ready for you to try

actions.name: Feature not used?
actions.description: Check if they've used the feature after the announcement.

actions.name: Reminder
actions.description: Remind them to use the feature.

value.html:
Hi there,

 

Quick check-in – the new feature we mentioned earlier is still available in your account.

 

If you haven’t had a chance to try it yet, no problem. When you’re ready, it’s there to help make things a little easier (or at least save you a few clicks).
Give it a try

And if now’s not the moment, feel free to ignore this and come back to it later. We’ll be right here.

 

Cheers,
The team

value.subject: Just checking in 👋
value.preheader: That new feature is still waiting for you.

actions.name: Feature not used?
actions.description: Final check if they're not using the feature.

actions.name: Email
actions.description: Send an email to the user.

value.html:
Hi there,

 

One last note from us.

 

The new feature we mentioned earlier is still available in your account, and this is the final reminder we’ll send about it.

 

If you’re curious, you can try it anytime here:
Try the feature

If not, no worries – we’ll take the hint and let you get back to what you were doing.

 

Thanks for reading,
The team

value.subject: Last call on the new feature
value.preheader: We’ll stop bugging you after this.

actions.name: Exit
actions.description: User moved through the workflow without errors.
